Header.title: Bhawan Care
Header.paragraph: Join us in creating a community where ideas flourish, friendships thrive, and together, we shape a better tomorrow. Our platform offers a suite of features designed to help you automate day-to-day operations, from tracking maintenance requests to managing finances effortlessly. Embrace the future of community living with tools that foster collaboration, transparency, and growth, making your society a better place for everyone.
Header.heading: Want to be a part of Bhawan Care Family ?

About.paragraph: Welcome to CPS PVT LTD, your trusted partner in society management. Our mission is to revolutionize the way communities interact and manage their daily operations through innovative technology and user-friendly solutions.
About.para2: At CPS PVT LTD, we understand the unique challenges that come with managing a residential community. Founded by Mr. Sibasish Sahu who is an extremely talented passionate professional with extensive experience in property management and technology, we are dedicated to making community living more efficient, enjoyable, and connected.
About.para3: Our comprehensive platform centralizes communication, automates maintenance requests, schedules community events, and enhances overall resident engagement. With our application, you can:
About.para4: Automate routine tasks to save time and reduce errors.
About.para5: We believe in creating harmonious and well-managed communities where residents feel heard, valued, and engaged. Our vision is to be the leading provider of society management solutions, continuously innovating to meet the evolving needs of our clients.
About.para6: Join the growing number of communities that trust CPS PVT LTD to enhance their living experience. Together, we can create a more organized, efficient, and vibrant community life.
About.para7: CPS PVT LTD.  Is a leading best services provider of community management solutions designed an application called “Bhawan Care” for society management to simplify and enhance living in residential complexes. Our innovative application streamlines essential services such as security management, visitor tracking, facility booking, and communication between residents and management. It aims to create a seamless and secure living experience by integrating advanced technology with user-friendly features.
About.para8: Join Bhawan Care today and experience efficient and effective community management at your fingertips.
About.para9: Our objective is to ensure standardized practices, efficient execution, and superior quality of applications Development for Society Management.
About.para10: We are reaching out to apartments and societies to introduce our innovative application that is designed to streamline and enhance the management and communication within the community.
About.para11: With our application, you can centralize communication, automate maintenance requests, schedule community events, and improve overall resident engagement. Our platform also allows for effective announcement management, secured access to important documents, and can significantly reduce the hassle of managing administrative tasks.
Why: Centralize Communication: Keep everyone in the loop with streamlined messaging and announcements.
Automate Maintenance Requests: Simplify the process of reporting and tracking maintenance issues.
Schedule Community Events: Plan and manage events effortlessly, ensuring maximum participation.
Improve Resident Engagement: Foster a sense of community with interactive features and updates.
Why2: Manage Announcements Effectively: Ensure important information reaches all residents promptly.
Secure Access to Documents: Provide residents with easy and secure access to important documents.
Reduce Administrative Hassle: Automate routine tasks to save time and reduce errors.
Why3: Innovation: We are committed to leveraging the latest technology to provide cutting-edge solutions.
Customer-Centricity: Our clients’ needs are at the heart of everything we do.
Integrity: We operate with transparency and honesty in all our dealings.
Why4: Community: We strive to build stronger, more connected communities.
Commitment to Excellence:  Striving for the highest quality in services and technology.

AboutContact.paragraph: Many Contact Us pages also feature a FAQ section that addresses common questions, helping users find quick answers without needing to reach out. Additionally, some pages offer business hours, response time estimates, and even map integrations for physical locations, making it easier for visitors to plan in-person visits. For customer-focused businesses, a well-designed Contact Us page emphasizes user-friendliness with mobile responsiveness, clear language, and minimal steps to ensure that reaching out is quick and efficient. A professional, personalized message at the top of the page often reassures users that their queries will be taken seriously, with promises of prompt or guaranteed responses.

Additional.title: Notice Board
Additional.paragraph: Stay updated with the latest announcements, events, and notices from the society management. Our digital notice board ensures that all important information is easily accessible to all residents.

Additional.title: Apply for Amenities
Additional.paragraph: Book society amenities such as the clubhouse, swimming pool, or gym through our app. Check availability, make reservations, and enjoy the facilities without any hassle.

Additional.title: Worker Details
Additional.paragraph: Access a verified list of domestic help and service providers within the society. Find detailed profiles, contact information, and reviews to hire reliable workers.

Additional.title: Society and Flats Information
Additional.paragraph: Get comprehensive information about the society and individual flats. This includes floor plans, amenities, bylaws, and other essential details for both current and prospective residents.

Additional.title: Emergency Contacts
Additional.paragraph: Quickly access important emergency contacts, including security, medical services, and society management. Ensure you have all the necessary information at your fingertips during urgent situations.

Additional.title: Meeting Arrangement
Additional.paragraph: Schedule and manage society meetings effortlessly. Send invites, set agendas, and keep track of meeting minutes, all through the app.

Services.name: Voting
Services.text: Ensure secure and transparent voting within your society. Nominate candidates, cast votes, and view real-time results, making elections easy and fair.

Services.name: Festival
Services.text: Stay updated on society festivals. Book your spot, contribute to celebrations, and engage with community events through a simple and efficient platform.

Services.name: Notice Board
Services.text: Receive real-time notifications about important announcements. Stay informed about society rules, events, and updates directly on your device.

Services.name: Emergency Contact
Services.text: Access emergency contacts quickly and easily. Ensure safety with direct access to essential services like security, medical help, maintenance, and emergency repairs.

Services.name: Complaint Box
Services.text: Submit complaints and track their status in real time. Our app helps ensure issues are addressed efficiently, enhancing transparency and accountability.

Services.name: Election
Services.text: Hold society elections with ease. Nominate, vote, and view results instantly, promoting fair and efficient decision-making within your community.

Services.name: Suggestion Box
Services.text: Submit your suggestions and ideas to improve the society. Track feedback and contribute to creating a better living environment for all residents.

Services.name: Arrange Meeting
Services.text: Easily organize and manage society meetings. Notify members, manage attendance, and ensure productive discussions through our intuitive app.

Testimonials.text: Bhawan Care has revolutionized how we manage our society! The automated maintenance payment feature saves us so much time. It's user-friendly and efficient—exactly what we needed!
Testimonials.name: Ratna Pratap Mohanty,

Testimonials.text: I’m amazed at how Bhawan Care simplifies communication with our management. No more waiting for responses! Everything is at our fingertips now. This app is a must-have for all residents!
Testimonials.name: Priya Gupta,

Testimonials.text: Bhawan Care has made it so easy to book common facilities and keep track of our society's events. The app is designed with residents in mind, making it a joy to use. Highly recommended!
Testimonials.name: Pratap Singh,

Testimonials.text: I love how Bhawan Care allows me to handle all my society needs from the comfort of my home. The communication with management has never been smoother. This app is a game changer for residents!
Testimonials.name: Nandita Verma,

Testimonials.text: As a resident, I love how Bhawan Care keeps us connected. The features for booking amenities and reporting issues are fantastic! It's great to see modern solutions for traditional challenges.
Testimonials.name: Rohit Chavan,

Testimonials.text: Bhawan Care has streamlined our society's operations. The maintenance charge automation is efficient and intuitive. I can’t imagine going back to the old way of managing things!
Testimonials.name: Devanshi Joshi,

Contact.address: Block - N5/123, 3rd floor, Radhamani Building, Jayadev Vihar Rd (Near Biju Pattnaik College), Bhubaneswar, Odisha 751013

Tenant.paragraph: Engage with your neighbors through our integrated communication features, making it easier to share ideas, and build lasting relationships.

Tenant.title: Join the Digital Community
Tenant.paragraph: Join the Digital Community to connect, engage, and collaborate with neighbors effortlessly through our app.

Tenant.title: Enhance Your Living Experience
Tenant.paragraph: Enhance your living experience with convenient amenities, and seamless communication through our app.

Tenant.title: Unlock Exclusive Features for Residents
Tenant.paragraph: As a registered member of your society, gain access to a wide array of exclusive features designed to enhance your living experience.

Security.title: Advanced Encryption for Sensitive Information
Security.paragraph: In today's digital age, protecting sensitive information is paramount, especially for applications that manage personal and financial data, such as those used by societies.

Security.title: Transparency in Data Handling Policies
Security.paragraph: Customise access for family, friends, and daily helps with ease.

Security.title: Real-Time Monitoring for Suspicious Activity
Security.paragraph: It is a proactive security feature designed to safeguard your application and its users.

Security.title: Secure Authentication for User Access
Security.paragraph: Secure authentication is a critical component in ensuring that only authorized individuals can access the application used by registered societies.

Features.title: Admin
Features.text: Easily manage dues, monitor visitors, and organize community events efficiently.

Features.title: Owner
Features.text: Handle maintenance, receive visitor alerts, and stay informed on community events.

Features.title: Tenant
Features.text: Pay maintenance online, get visitor notifications, and stay informed on society events.

Features.title: Security Guard
Features.text: Manage visitor entries, ensure safety, and coordinate security for community events.

AllFeature.title: Maintenance Charge
AllFeature.text: Easily manage and pay maintenance charges through our app. Get reminders, view breakdowns, and make secure payments online, ensuring hassle-free upkeep of society amenities.

AllFeature.title: Create Election
AllFeature.text: Easily organize elections through our app. Set up candidates, voting timelines, and monitor results in real-time. Ensure fairness and transparency with our streamlined election creation process.

AllFeature.title: Service Requests
AllFeature.text: Submit service requests directly through our app. Whether it's maintenance, IT support, or other services, track the progress and get issues resolved quickly and efficiently.

AllFeature.title: Garage Rent
AllFeature.text: Find and rent garages in your society with ease. Our app connects you to available garages, allowing you to manage rentals and payments hassle-free.

AllFeature.title: Festival
AllFeature.text: Plan and participate in society festivals through our app. Stay informed about upcoming events, book your spot, and contribute to making community celebrations even better.

AllFeature.title: Meeting Arrangement
AllFeature.text: Schedule and coordinate meetings seamlessly. Our app helps you set meeting agendas, notify participants, and ensure everyone stays informed and organized.

AllFeature.title: Collection & Expenses
AllFeature.text: Track and manage collections and expenses effortlessly. Our app provides a clear overview of dues, payments, and financial transparency, making society management simple.

AllFeature.title: Ladies Club
AllFeature.text: Join the Ladies Club via the app. Stay updated on activities, events, and discussions, and connect with fellow members to foster a sense of community.

AllFeature.title: Security Gate
AllFeature.text: Enhance security with our app by monitoring gate entries and exits in real-time. Keep track of visitor activity and ensure your community remains safe.

SocietyInfo.text1: Stay updated with all society announcements, meetings, and events through the app's Notice Board. Receive instant updates on safety notices and emergency alerts to ensure you're always informed.
Store and access emergency contact information in the app. Quickly reach out to key individuals or authorities during urgent situations, ensuring timely assistance when it's most needed.
Track external workers entering your society through the app. Manage and monitor temporary workers for maintenance or specific tasks, enhancing security and transparency.
Manage your laundry services within the society using the app. Book laundry slots, monitor service progress, and get notifications when your laundry is ready for pickup.
Stay informed about society holiday events. View and participate in organized celebrations for national holidays or community gatherings, fostering unity and participation.
Access detailed information about society members, including joining dates and profiles, directly through the app. Easily track member tenure and other relevant details.
View and manage society bank details in one place. Track transactions, contributions, and expenses with transparency, ensuring smooth financial operations.
Review and adhere to society rules through the app. Easily access guidelines and policies that maintain order and ensure smooth community living.
Monitor internal staff activities through the app. Ensure all tasks are completed efficiently, enhancing communication and performance within the society.
Utilize intercom services directly through the app to communicate with other society members or management, facilitating quick and efficient responses.
Stay informed about society details, including historical data, events, and important updates. Access all society-related information with just a few taps on the app.
